name: 陳煒朋
objective: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項。
schedule:
1. Introduction to financial management
2. Financial statements, taxes, and cash flow
3. Working with financial statements
4. Introduction to valuation
5. Discounted cash flow valuation
6. 清明節
7. Interest rates and bond valuation
8. Equity markets and stock valuation
9. Midterm Exam
10. Net present value and other investment criteria
11. Making capital investment decisions
12. Some lessons from capital market history
13. Risk and return
14. Cost of capital
15. Leverage and capital structure
16. Dividends and dividend policy
17. Working capital management
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (期中考)：50%
Final Exam (期末考)：50%
materials:
Textbook：
Ross, S.A., Westerfield, R.A.W., & Jordan, B.D., Fundamentals of Corporate Finance, 11th Edition, 2016, McGraw-Hill International Edition. (華泰書局)。

Reference：
1. Ross, S.A., Westerfield, R.A.W., & Jordan, B.D., Essentials of Corporate Finance, 9th Edition, 2017, McGraw-Hill International Edition. (華泰書局)。
2. 徐燕山(譯)，財務管理，10/E，東華書局
3. 郭震坤、李志偉(編譯)，財務管理，11/E，華泰書局。
4. Benninga, S., “Financial Modeling” 3rd Edition. (指南書局)。
5. 姜堯民，財務軟體應用，新陸書局。
6. 謝劍平，財務管理－新觀念與本土化，智勝文化事業有限公司。
